name: 3D Graffiti Subway Spray Can Juggle Game
name_original: 3D Graffiti Subway Spray Can Juggle Game
description: Beautiful graffiti game juggle subway theme. Juggle these spray cans as you play to get the top score. Cool artistic spray paint art cans to unlock. Art meets sports as you tap and swipe to keep the cans in the air. Challenging and is a good free time killer. The can is better than the soccer ball juggling. Fun for all ages, boys and girls.
